bibl.title: Letter from C.G. Toepper to Philip Showalter Hench, September 23, 1940

div1.p: Toepper has sent Hench a copy of the 1904 E.R. Barnett publication on Las Animas Hospital.

div1.head: Letter from C.G. Toepper to Philip Showalter Hench, September 23, 1940
div1.opener:
CGT-CD
WAR DEPARTMENT
ARMY MEDICAL LIBRARY
7TH ST. AND INDEPENDENCE AVE. SW
WASHINGTON
September 23, 1940.
Dr. Philip S. Hench,
Mayo Clinic,
Rochester, Minnesota.
My dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
In response to your request of the 17th inst., the E.R.
Barnett work “El Hospital Las Animas,” Habana, 1904, was sent to you
by insured parcel post mail on the 18th, and no doubt reached you with-
out delay.

Mailing charges amounted to twelve cents, and as the Library
has no fund for transportation of material to borrowers, it is requested
that you forward this amount as soon as convenient.
div1.closer:
Yours very truly, C. G. Toepper, Assistant,
For the Librarian. All communications should be addressed to “The Librarian, Army Medical Library, Washington, D.C.”
